channel.title: Microsoft for Developers
channel.description: Get the latest information, insights, and news from Microsoft.

item.title: 【Scalable AI with Azure Cosmos DB - Video Series】与Azure Cosmos DB的可伸缩AI - 视频系列
item.description: 【Scalable AI in Action with Azure Cosmos DB – A Monthly Partner Showcase As AI continues to reshape industries, customers are seeking scalable, real-time solutions that integrate seamlessly with their existing data platforms. Azure Cosmos DB, with its global distribution, low latency, and multi-model support, is uniquely p】Azure Cosmos DB的可扩展AI - 随着AI的每月伴侣展示，随着AI的继续展示，客户正在寻求可扩展的实时解决方案，以与现有的数据平台无缝集成。 Azure Cosmos DB具有全球分布，低潜伏期和多模型支持，是独特的p

item.title: 【Dynamically Update C++ syntax using Next Edit Suggestions】使用下一个编辑建议动态更新C ++语法
item.description: 【When working in a C++ repo, you often are maintaining and updating existing code just as often as you are writing new code. However, updating code in C++ can often require navigating to several different locations in a file to ensure consistency, which can disrupt your logical workflow. For example, changing a data member’s access level typi】在C ++仓库中工作时，您通常会像编写新代码一样频繁地维护和更新现有代码。但是，C ++中的更新代码通常需要导航到文件中的几个不同位置以确保一致性，这可能会破坏您的逻辑工作流程。例如，更改数据成员的访问级别典型

item.title: 【.NET and .NET Framework August 2025 servicing releases updates】.NET和.NET框架2025年8月Servicating发布更新
item.description: 【Welcome to our combined .NET servicing updates for August 2025. Let's get into the latest release of .NET & .NET Framework, here is a quick overview of what's new in our servicing releases: Security improvements .NET and .NET Framework has been refreshed with the latest update as of August 05, 2025. This update contains non-secu】欢迎使用2025年8月的总和.NET维修更新。让我们进入.NET＆.NET Framework的最新版本，以下是我们维修版本中新事物的快速概述：安全改进。NET和.NET框架，并在2025年8月的2025年8月更新中重新刷新了。

item.title: 【Exploring new Agent Quality and NLP evaluators for .NET AI applications】探索.NET AI应用程序的新代理质量和NLP评估器
item.description: 【When building AI applications, comprehensive evaluation is crucial to ensure your systems deliver accurate, reliable, and contextually appropriate responses. We're excited to announce key enhancements to the Microsoft.Extensions.AI.Evaluation libraries with new】在构建AI应用程序时，全面的评估对于确保您的系统提供准确，可靠和上下文适当的响应至关重要。我们很高兴地宣布Microsoft.extensions.ai.Ai.Evaluation库的密钥增强功能

item.title: 【Introducing MCP Support in AI Shell Preview 6】在AI Shell Preview 6中引入MCP支持6
item.description: 【AI Shell Preview 6 is here! We are super excited to announce the latest preview release of AI Shell. This release focuses on enhancing the user experience with new features, improved error handling, and better integration with Model Context Protocol (MCP) tools. What's new at a glance】AI Shell Preview 6在这里！我们很高兴宣布AI Shell的最新预览版本。该版本的重点是增强用户体验新功能，改进的错误处理以及与模型上下文协议（MCP）工具更好的集成。一目了然

item.title: 【Why are Windows semiannual updates named H1 and H2?】为什么Windows半年度更新名为H1和H2？
item.description: 【Windows issues monthly updates, but the bigger updates happen twice a year. The one that happens in the first half of the year is called the H1 release, and the one in the second half is the H2 release. The letter H refers to "half", which is the same pattern used by finance people to refer to the first and second halves of fiscal years. (Q】Windows会发出每月更新，但每年发生两次更新。在今年上半年发生的一种被称为H1版本，下半年是H2版本。字母h提到“一半”，这与财务人员使用的模式相同，指的是财政年度的第一和第二半。 （q

item.title: 【Visual Studio 2015 Retirement: Support reminder for older versions of Visual Studio】Visual Studio 2015退休：较旧版本的Visual Studio的支持提醒
item.description: 【Support for Visual Studio 2015 will end on October 14, 2025. If you’re using an older version of Visual Studio, we want to keep you productive and secure when using Visual Studio, and strongly recommend you upgrade to Visual Studio 2022, which brings the power of Copilot to your development workflow. It also contains key productivity improve】支持Visual Studio 2015将于2025年10月14日结束。如果您使用较旧版本的Visual Studio，我们希望在使用Visual Studio时保持富有成效和安全的安全，并强烈建议您升级到Visual Studio 2022，这将使Copilot的力量带入开发工作流程。它还包含关键的生产率提高

item.title: 【Automate your open-source dependency scanning with Advanced Security】使用高级安全性自动化开源依赖性扫描
item.description: 【Any experiences that require additional setup is cumbersome, especially when there are multiple people needed. In GitHub Advanced Security for Azure DevOps, we're working to make it easier to enable features and scale out enablement across your enterprise. You can now automatically inject the dependency scanning task into a】任何需要额外设置的经验都很麻烦，尤其是在需要多个人的情况下。在GitHub的Azure DevOps Advanced Security中，我们正在努力使启用功能并扩展启用企业的功能变得更加容易。您现在可以自动将依赖项扫描任务注入
